name: Ausangate Sivinacocha Trek 7 Days / 6 Nights
description: This unforgettable hike is recommended for experienced trekkers who are searching for an extreme experience in remote areas and wild nature. If you are able to handle high altitude and long distances, join us as we trek in the shadow of the snow-capped sacred mountain “Apu” Ausangate, the largest mountain in Cusco region. Walk along the shores of the enormous Sibinacocha lagoon and help Andean communities by bringing them notebooks, toys, and clothing. This trek will take us over high mountain passes, through remote Andean villages, and past hot springs and beautful turqoise lakes.
